name: ayika-fullstack
description: Ayika Full-Stack Application - Emergency Aid and Needs Coordination Network

scripts.clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.shell:backend: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py shell
scripts.migrate: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.createsuperuser: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.collectstatic: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.create-test-volunteers: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py create_test_volunteers --skip-existing
scripts.create-sample-cargo: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py create_sample_cargo --skip-existing
scripts.create-admin: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py create_admin_user
scripts.create-admin-custom: docker exec -it ayika-backend python manage.py create_admin_user --email
scripts.setup: npm run makemigrations && npm run migrate && npm run create-admin && npm run create-test-volunteers && npm run create-sample-cargo
scripts.full-setup: npm run dev:down && npm run dev && timeout /t 10 && npm run setup

author: Ayika Team
